name: RegExMatchReplace
description: Visual Studio Team Services Task to replace file content with a regex match
author: Kasun Kodagoda

inputs.name: PathToFile
inputs.label: Path to File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the file to run the Regular Expression search.

inputs.name: RegEx
inputs.label: Regular Expression to use
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the regular expression without the modifiers. _(Eg. (?:\d*\.)?\d+)_ Learn more about Regular Expressions from [Microsoft RegEx Quick Reference](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference) and test your Regular Expressions online using [RegExr](https://regexr.com/)

inputs.name: Global
inputs.label: Global Match (g)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Perform a global match _(Find all matches rather than stopping after the first match)_.

inputs.name: ValueToReplace
inputs.label: Replacement value
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the value to replace with the regex match.
